column3: Kraest Jesus somafo a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ nkwa a ɔwɔ Kraest Jesus mu anohoba tse
column9: mfi Egya Nyankopɔn nye hɛn Ewuradze Kraest Jesus hɔ nka wo."

column2: "Meda Nyankopɔn a medze tsibowa krɔnn som no dɛ mbrɛ me nananom yɛe no ase
column3: dɛ minngyaa wo nkaa wɔ mo nkotoserɛ mu adzekyee nye adzesaa."
mo kɔn dɔ dɛ mubohu wo na dɛw aahyɛ me ma:"

column2: "dɛ ama makaa nokwar gyedzi a ɔwɔ wo mu a odzii kan tsenaa wo nana Lɔis nye wo na Eunise mu no; na megye dzi dɛ ɔwɔ wo so wo mu."
"Ɔno ntsi mekaa wo dɛ kenyan Nyankopɔn akyɛdze a inyae wɔ wo mu no ber a medze me nsa guu wo do no."
"Na Nyankopɔn amma hɛn suro sunsum bi
column3: na mbom ahoɔdzen nye dɔ nye adwenmutsewee dze a."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma w’enyi nnto hɛn Ewuradze adasedzi no
column3: anaa emi a meyɛ ne daduanyi no ho; na mbom sɔw asɛmpa no ho akotorka no bi
na ɔdze ɔfrɛ krɔnkrɔn no frɛɛ hɛn
column5: na mbom nankasa ne tsirmpɔw nye n’adom a ɔdze doom hɛn wɔ Kraest Jesus mu fi tsetseetse
column7: "na afei wɔnam Kraest Jesus ne nyikyerɛ do eyi no edzi no do a; ɔno a oeyi owu efi hɔ
column8: na ɔnam asɛmpa no do dze nkwa nye bɛkyebo aba kan mu

column2: "Ɔno ntsi so na muruhu amandze yi: naaso m’enyi nnto; osiandɛ minyim nyia magye no edzi
column3: na megye dzi yie dɛ obotum akora dza medze ahyɛ ne nsa no esie da no."

column2: "Suo nsɛm pa esusudo a etsee no me nkyɛn no mu yie
column4: "wɔ gyedzi nye ɔdɔ a ɔwɔ Kraest Jesus mu no mu. Akoradze pa a wɔdze hyɛɛ wo nsa no dua Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn a ɔtse hɛn mu no do kora do."

column3: dɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ Asia nyina danee fii me nkyɛn;"

column2: "hɔn mu bi nye Figelus nye Hermogenes. Ewuradze nhu Onesiforɔs fie mbɔbɔr
column3: nna ɔtɔ dɛ ɔma mo ho dwe me
column4: na n’enyi annto mo nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn ho."

column2: "Ewuradze mma onnya ɔnoara Ewuradze hɔ ehumbɔbɔr wɔ da no mu; na dodow a ɔsomee wɔ Efeso
